channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MAHOUT-649] Test org.apache.mahout.text.SequenceFilesFromMailArchivesTest fails on windows
item.description:
org.apache.mahout.text.SequenceFilesFromMailArchivesTest seems to be platform-dependent in assertion (path comparisons). Assertion fails on Windows

stack trace:
Test set: org.apache.mahout.text.SequenceFilesFromMailArchivesTest

sec <<< FAILURE!

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Looks like an easy fix – along the way cleaned up some things about this test and a few other tests.
Thanks Sean. (you're too fast for me )

Integrated in Mahout-Quality #717 (See https://hudson.apache.org/hudson/job/Mahout-Quality/717/)
MAHOUT-649 fix small platform-specific file path problem in test
